```{r}
library(ggplot2)

world <- ne_countries(scale = "medium", returnclass = "sf")
```

```{r}
library(ggfx)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggfx)
library(rnaturalearth)
library(sf)

Italy <- rnaturalearth::ne_countries(country = "Italy",
                                     scale = "small", 
                                     returnclass = "sf")
```

```{r}
rome <- st_sfc(st_point(c(12.4822, 41.8967)), crs = 4326) # WGS84
```


```{r}
ggplot(Italy) +
  with_shadow(
    geom_sf(color = "black", fill = "white", linewidth = 0.5),
    sigma = 2, x_offset = 1, y_offset = 1
  ) +
  geom_sf_label(data = rome, 
          label="ROME",
          fill="#f8f4e3", size = 3) +
  coord_sf(crs = "ESRI:54052") +  # Goode Homolosine
  theme_void() +
  labs(title="ITALY",
       caption = "#30DayMapChallenge 2025 Day11 Minimal\n Italy | Map: Federica Gazzelloni") +
  theme(plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#f8f4e3", 
                                       color = NA),
        plot.title = element_text(hjust=0.5),
        plot.title.position = "panel",
        plot.caption = element_text(size=6,hjust=0.5))
```

```{r}
ggsave("day11_minimal.png",
```
